mapper.select: SELECT PK_INVENTORY_SEQ, DT_INVENTORY_SLIP_DATE, N_INVENTORY_CNT, V_ZONE_CD, I.V_WAREHOUSE_CD, I.V_PRODUCT_CD, P.V_PRODUCT_NM, W.V_WAREHOUSE_NM FROM TB_INVENTORY I LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON I.V_PRODUCT_CD = P.V_PRODUCT_CD LEFT JOIN TB_WAREHOUSE W ON I.V_WAREHOUSE_CD = W.V_WAREHOUSE_CD ORDER BY PK_INVENTORY_SEQ
SELECT W.V_WAREHOUSE_NM, V_ZONE_NM FROM TB_WAREHOUSE W JOIN TB_ZONE Z ON Z.V_WAREHOUSE_CD = W.V_WAREHOUSE_CD ORDER BY W.V_WAREHOUSE_NM, V_ZONE_NM

SELECT main.V_CATEGORY_NM AS V_MAIN_CATEGORY_NM, sub.V_CATEGORY_NM AS V_SUB_CATEGORY_NM, detail.V_CATEGORY_NM AS V_DETAIL_CATEGORY_NM FROM TB_CATEGORY AS main INNER JOIN TB_CATEGORY AS sub ON sub.V_CATEGORY_PARENT_CD = main.V_CATEGORY_CD INNER JOIN TB_CATEGORY AS detail ON detail.V_CATEGORY_PARENT_CD = sub.V_CATEGORY_CD

SELECT PK_INVENTORY_SEQ , COALESCE(N_INVENTORY_SHIPPING_CNT, '') AS N_INVENTORY_SHIPPING_CNT , DT_INVENTORY_CHANGE_DATE , COALESCE(V_INVENTORY_CHANEGE_TYPE, '') AS V_INVENTORY_CHANEGE_TYPE , COALESCE(V_ZONE_CD, '') AS V_ZONE_CD , COALESCE(V_WAREHOUSE_CD, '') AS V_WAREHOUSE_CD , COALESCE(V_ZONE_CD2, '') AS V_ZONE_CD2 , COALESCE(V_WAREHOUSE_CD2, '') AS V_WAREHOUSE_CD2 FROM TB_INVENTORY_HISTORY WHERE PK_INVENTORY_SEQ = #{pkInventorySeq}
